rule.field: -nop -w hidden -c \.* [Convert]::FromBase64String| -w hidden -noni -nop -c "iex\(New-Object| -w hidden -ep bypass -Enc|powershell.exe reg add HKCU\\\\software\\\\microsoft\\\\windows\\\\currentversion\\\\run|bypass -noprofile -windowstyle hidden \(new-object system.net.webclient\).download|iex\(New-Object Net.WebClient\).Download
rule.description: ATT&CK T1086: Suspicious PowerShell Invocations - Specific
rule.info: Detects suspicious PowerShell invocation command parameters
